python3 -m venv venv source venv/bin/activate pip install django django-admin startproject weather cd weather django-admin startapp currentweather INSTALLED_APPS = [ 'currentweather', ] WEATHER_API_KEY = '' from django.db import models class WeatherData(models.Model): location = models.CharField(max_length=100) temperature = models.IntegerField() condition = models.CharField(max_length=100) from django.shortcuts import render import requests from .models import WeatherData def get_weather_data(location): return url = 'http://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q={}&appid={}'.format(location, WEATHER_API_KEY) data = requests.get(url).json() return data def weather(request): location = request.GET.get('location', '') weather_data = get_weather_data(location) context = { 'weather_data': weather_data, } return render(request, 'currentweather/weather.html', context)
